#!/usr/bin/python

import os
import sys

inp = sys.stdin.readline
tc = int(inp())

def price_per_nail(N, v):
	for i in xrange(9, 0, -1):
		for j in xrange(9, -1, -1):
			t = (i * 10**4) + v + j
			if t % N == 0:
				return (i, j, t / N)
	return None

while tc > 0:
	tc -= 1
	N = int(inp())
	p = inp().split()
	
	v=0
	for i in xrange(3, 0, -1):
		v += 10**i * int(p[3 - i])
	
	ppn = price_per_nail(N, v)
	if ppn == None:
		print 0
	else:
		print "%i %i %i" %(ppn[0], ppn[1], ppn[2])
